How were the scFv antibodies engineered: By linking the variable heavy (VH) and light (VL) chains with a flexible peptide linker
By attaching the Fc region to the variable heavy (VH) chain
By fusing the variable light (VL) chain directly to the constant region
By using a rigid peptide linker between the heavy and light chains
What is the primary target for the neutr: The receptor-binding domain (RBD) of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein
What method was used to select scFv anti: Using the spike RBD as the target
Using the nucleocapsid protein as the target
Using the membrane protein as the target
Using the envelope protein as the target
